essential_properties.name: baseCurrency

essential_properties.name: platformId

common_operations.name: Candlestick
common_operations.description: Get a candlestick open-high-low-close chart for the selected currency

common_operations.name: Get
common_operations.description: Get current data for a coin

common_operations.name: History
common_operations.description: Get historical data (name, price, market, stats) at a given date for a coin
